name: Carpooling - when the hitch-hiker pays
short_description: Carpooling (ride-sharing,lift-sharing) is shared use of a car. Check wiki for more info. The software is for internal use inside a big firm. Web based OS independent tool. Doesn't use US.Patent @ http://www.carpoolworld.com.ss
